title: The Silver Stone Challenge
description: The Silver Stone Festival is the most important celebration of the Eskar Kingdoms. Spectators arrive in Ivoer from every capital to watch the Knights of the Order and cadets of their Academies face the trials and witness the Silver Stone.Sixteen-year-old Eilenar lives alone with his mother on the outskirts of Ivoer. Kept away from the festival and the Order of Eskar Academy since he was born, this year he learns his name is on the lists.If his team wins, Ivoer gets to keep the Silver Stone in the city for another year... And the victor of the final challenge gets to ask for a wish from the powerful artifact.But the Silver's light attracts strange visitors that only Eilenar seems to see. Darkness enfolds the city, but Eilenar will not be alone. The winged guardian's voice finds Eilenar. Magic is awakening again. Can Eilenar help his team and keep his secret? The rules have changed... and not all who seek the stone will play by them.
author: Vanessa Bettencourt
